title: Confessions of a Substitute Teacher
description:
This week, Joe learns way too much about Star Wars from an enthusiastic student before spilling the the tea on what actually happens when the substitute shows up to a new classroom.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
